com.camerontec.catalys.server.configuration.jmx

Class ConfigurationMBeanRegistrar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.configuration.jmx.ConfigurationMBeanRegistrar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfigurationEventListener

    public class ConfigurationMBeanRegistrar
extends Object
implements IConfigurationEventListener
    This class creates and registers configuration mbeans. It uses ConfigurationObjectNameFactory to convert the Name of the configuration into a JMX ObjectName. It contains the knowledge of which type of mbean to create for which type of configuration.

    It can inspect the configuration registry and register mbeans for its contents.

    It can also listen for configuration events and keep the mbeans up to date with any changes to the configuration.

    It can also unregister all configuration mbeans.
